Package index

Data schemas

Mathematical and statistical utilities

clamp() rvar_clamp()
Clamp a variable

Scaled inverse-chi distribution

Safe log transform
logit_shift()
Logit-shift a vector to have a specified mean

Ecological Inference utilities

Run semiparametric EI and sensitivity analysis

Subset EI Estimates to Turnout
ei_norm_abs()
(Very) Approximate Normalization of EI Estimates Among Voters

Bayesian linear regression

Generate samples from a fitted model.

Compute credible intervals and confidence sequences
